channel.description: Recent content in postgresql on Sometimes we write something:)

item.title: Hybrid MongoDB / SQL Applications
item.description: MongoDB is often used alongside a relational database such as Oracle or MySQL. It is often unclear when one should use one or the other, or if a combination is really ideal. During this online presentation, we will discuss the ideal use cases for each, and how they can be used in conjunction. We’ll make sure to touch on several real world examples. The full recording can be found at 10gen’s site at http://www.
